newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen mixed on selective buying.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen mixed on selective buying.

text.p: Shares on the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) are likely to be mixed as brokers expect fresh buying of some selected blue chips which lost in recent sessions.
"Some selected scrips are expected to attract buyers, but the overall market sentiment is still weak," said broker Khurshid Alam.
"The market badly needs cash to recover from the bearishness. Financial institutions must respond to credit demands," he added.
The DSE all-share price index lost 7.9 points or 0.81 percent to 956.07 on turnover of 39.8 million taka on Monday. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
